title: Undue LeaverBuster
body: So last night, my net went haywire. I couldn't do anything on the net , and even my mobile data was acting up. I have a 20 min leaver buster on now and i couldn't even do anything to prevent it

replies.body:
A [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) low-priority queue is not an action that is taken after a single disconnection. It takes a trend of disconnections before you'll see an LPQ, because we understand that sometimes *stuff happens* or an emergency comes up.

If you're continuously experiencing any technical issues that cause you to disconnect, please let me know and we can work on resolving it.
